amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete 17 limitations on the use of funds affecting worker protection, women, education, and political advocacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 36 in the Congressional Record of July 31, to eliminate 16 limitations on the use of funds affecting worker protection, women, education, and political advocacy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 270 (Roll no. 611).
